alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 15 at 1:53PM MST until October 15 at 2:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM MST FOR MARICOPA COUNTY... At 153 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Arrowhead Mall to Litchfield Park to Estrella Mountain Ranch, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Peoria, Surprise, Avondale, Goodyear, Buckeye, El Mirage, Tolleson, Youngtown, Sun City West, Waddell, Cashion, Sun City and Litchfield Park. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 115 and 143. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 201 and 210. US Highway 60 between mile markers 133 and 160. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
